sourcesContent: module.exports=function(t){var r=function(t){var r,n,e,i=t.toHex(),a=t.alpha(),h=i.split(""),s=h[1],o=h[2],u=h[3],l=h[4],p=h[5],f=h[6],g=h[7],v=h[8];if(a>0&&a<1&&(r=parseInt(g+v,16)/255,void 0===(n=2)&&(n=0),void 0===e&&(e=Math.pow(10,n)),Math.round(e*r)/e+0!==a))return null;if(s===o&&u===l&&p===f){if(1===a)return"#"+s+u+p;if(g===v)return"#"+s+u+p+g}return i},n=function(t){return t>0&&t<1?t.toString().replace("0.","."):t};t.prototype.minify=function(t){void 0===t&&(t={});var e=this.toRgb(),i=n(e.r),a=n(e.g),h=n(e.b),s=this.toHsl(),o=n(s.h),u=n(s.s),l=n(s.l),p=n(this.alpha()),f=Object.assign({hex:!0,rgb:!0,hsl:!0},t),g=[];if(f.hex&&(1===p||f.alphaHex)){var v=r(this);v&&g.push(v)}if(f.rgb&&g.push(1===p?"rgb("+i+","+a+","+h+")":"rgba("+i+","+a+","+h+","+p+")"),f.hsl&&g.push(1===p?"hsl("+o+","+u+"%,"+l+"%)":"hsla("+o+","+u+"%,"+l+"%,"+p+")"),f.transparent&&0===i&&0===a&&0===h&&0===p)g.push("transparent");else if(1===p&&f.name&&"function"==typeof this.toName){var c=this.toName();c&&g.push(c)}return function(t){for(var r=t[0],n=1;n<t.length;n++)t[n].length<r.length&&(r=t[n]);return r}(g)}};
